topics.body:
I have a actual question; what gave rise to the hipster and anti-popularity fandoms?

If you ask me those two fandoms have gotten completely out of control are some sort of all seeing all powerful monolith imposing the belief that anything becoming popular or anything that is popular "needs" to be wiped off the face of the earth.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552468286368724de9cb0500#post_552468286368724de9cb0500

Remember the Underground movement from the mid 00's? Where suddenly the streets were what everyone wanted and seen as the greatest thing since, you know, the last trend?

This always happens and just like that, it will simply banish and get replaced by something else.

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552469eb6368721ba9460500#post_552469eb6368721ba9460500
Not really; the games are not being produced in the west in any shape or form; rather from now on there's going to be official translations and be sold online.  It's not anymore of a "disaster" than you being able to buy japanese games without having to learn japanese and being able to buy them legally.

topics.body:
Speaking of Anti-Fandoms.

I had a dream that there was this artist that did porn works and for some reason an Anti-Community was made after this one artist to the point it turned into some kind of weird cult.

And they all gathered at this one building in the middle of the ocean and preached how much they hated this one artist, like they had bibles and everything about how much people hated her to the point it went back in time to her ancestors.

Also Pokémon exist and me and some other people went to spy on these people and they found out and kicked us out and sent us floating in the middle of the ocean with a bunch of Pokémon.
